long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TextBin is an Open Source Privacy Focused Alternative to PasteBin. here, users can create texts and share texts with other using a unique url for their texts. All the texts content created on TextBin are end to end encrypted, that means the server of textbin has no idea what the content is. TextBin only stores title, format, creation and expiry time of the text as is on the server and keeps the content end to end encrypted.
